article.title: Modern Technology Offers Distributed Digital Simulation
article.text: Modern Technology Solutions Inc., Alexandria, Virginia, was awarded a $63,799,786 cost-plus-fixed-fee, multi-year contract to support distributed digital simulation, with an estimated completion date of March 1, 2021.Â Funding and work location will be determined with each order. The Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity (W31P4Q-16-D-0017).
